thread.title: Flip Saunders dead of cancer, longtime NBA coach was 60 - Newsday
thread.title_full: Flip Saunders dead of cancer, longtime NBA coach was 60 - Newsday - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Newsday
title: Flip Saunders dead of cancer, longtime NBA coach was 60 - Newsday
text:
Flip Saunders, the longtime NBA coach who won more than 650 games in nearly two decades and was trying to rebuild the Minnesota Timberwolves as team president, coach and part owner, died Sunday, the team said. He was 60. Saunders was diagnosed with Hodgkin lymphoma in June and doctors called it "treatable and curable," when the Timberwolves made the diagnosis public in August.
 Newsday.
